name: medichain-web
description: MediChain AI - Decentralized Medical Diagnostics Web Interface

scripts.type-check:all: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.type-check:all:strict: npm run lint && npm run type-check:strict
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.stop: lsof -ti:3000,3001,3002 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && pkill -f 'next dev' 2>/dev/null || true && echo '✅ Stopped all background processes'
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules .next package-lock.json && echo '✅ Cleaned: node_modules, .next, package-lock.json'
scripts.clean:cache: rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache && echo '✅ Cleaned: .next and node_modules cache'
